name: paragraph
label: Paragraph
default:
Work your way up. We have Fans. Super Fans. And the illustrious Ultimate Fans. Each tier exists to reward you - bonus raffle chances, exclusive invites, extra birthday gifts .. we are not stopping there!

Supers and Ultimates will unlock privilege rewards. Z Points not spent following transactions will be carried over to your next redemption. Z Points DO NOT expire but you will need to be in receipt of points in the last 90 days to enjoy benefits.
